name: Propelics
tagline: Enterprise Mobile Strategy and World-Class Apps
description: Propelics creates mobile strategies and world class apps for businesses. Their mission is to help great companies reimagine, refine, and reinvigorate their business processes, systems, and data to enable more engaging and productive interactions with customers, partners, and employees through mobile devices. They don’t just mobilize business processes, they transform them to help you get ahead—and stay ahead—of the competition.
